forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
